author: Federico Tomasselli
description: “I have always been inspired by the term ‘less is more,’ both in the course of my life, and in my drinks: simplicity is the path I prefer to follow.“For my ‘Legacy’ cocktail, I decided to use just a few simple ingredients, leaving space for the BACARDÍ Carta Blanca to come through in a different way.”
name: Cuban Saint

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass
